### Welcome to Roadcrew.js
Roadcrew.js is a small JavaScript component which lets you switch pages of an single file website. This is very useful in combination with for example [Apache Cordova](http://cordova.apache.org). While you are of course able to jump between different HTML files it is more efficient in many cases not to reload the whole view. The idea is not new. I have found it first in jQuery Mobile. As I am not a huge fan of jQuery Mobile I wanted to migrate away from it, but just keep this feature. The resulting code has been named Roadcrew.js, because I listened to "We are the Roadcrew" from Mot√∂rhead when I started it.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Authors
Roadcrew.js has been developed by Christian Grobmeier (Github / Twitter: @grobmeier). You can also contact me [via my website](http://www.grobmeier.de)
